section.name: Section 4 - Differentiated Professional Learning
section.summary:
Professional learning should be differentiated, too! Put it all together with a lesson customized for your students and circumstances. Plan to do two parts to this assignment, which is common for all participants this time.


First, do the Writing Objectives assignment and get feedback.


Second, construct a full lesson plan using that objective in the online Lesson Planner.

NOTE: Use the WIPPEA model to draft your lesson. This template (doc)  will help you. Read about the Lesson Plan Model.
